channel.title: ml on Saikat Kumar Dey
channel.description: Recent content in ml on Saikat Kumar Dey

item.title: Training Image Classification Models with scikeras
item.description: In this blog post, we will demonstrate how to use the scikeras library to combine the capabilities of TensorFlow and scikit-learn for training image classification models. We will show how to use TensorFlow’s ImageDataGenerator() function to load and augment images, and how to use scikeras’s KerasClassifier() to create a scikit-learn compatible interface for training the model.

item.title: Accuracy Is a Poor evaluation Metric
item.description: Issues with using accuracy as an evaluation metric and what you should use instead
